column3: â€œRaspberry kush is on fleek. Just what I needed after a long week of campaigning. It's got a pretty high THC content (19.88%) for an Indica. Remember kids - this shit is lit, fam. Have fun being horny and hungry!â€

â€œLooks: Dense light green nugs with dark orange hairs and light purple in the inside with even a hint of some light pink.

Smell: Pine-Sol smell, with a strong raspberry yogurt smell as soon as you break open a nug.

Taste: Very smooth for how hard it hits you, very tasty kush taste with a light after taste of raspberry yogurt.

Buzz Type: Really strong indica effects but you can definitely tell that there is so...â€

â€œThis is my new favorite strain! I smoke the flower for anxiety, depression and PTSD. This beautiful strain instantly made me more relaxed than I have possibly ever been. It is great for muscle tension and a racing mind. Everything tastes better, smells better, feels better sounds better and my worried mind finally gets a break. My creativity level is at an all time high. After years of powerful medications with awful...â€

â€œMigraine pain undeterminable; nausea 8 when I medicated round 0600 or so. Takes bout 10 min to start working. Pain gone; nausea all but gone (3-4). Nausea has been really awful period; no matter what. No anxiety/paranoia which is a Godsend for me. Body high allowed me to get some much needed sleep as I slept really poor last night. Head high heavy as hell which is exactly what I needed/wanted. Top quality sleeper bud...â€

â€œNow I have tried the Select Strains' vape concentrate of Raspberry Kush, but the flower Razzberry Kush might be different, I'm not sure, though they do seem to share a lot of qualities so I'm reviewing it here. I picked up this indica flower at Glisan Buds, it is stinky dank, and what I am smoking tonite. The bud smells like deep, ripe raspberry with masculine musk undertones. The first inhale goes on like a velvet g...â€

â€œIf I could give this one 6 stars I would. I highly recommend this one for body pain. Its magnificent anti anxiety with a natural and effective calming effect. Raspberry kush is the very definition of a strain that melts the days troubles away" was also terrific at shutting off my hamster wheel brain of problems and crisis that is just a part of life all us adults must face head on. Raspberry kush is the very best at...â€"

Smell: It lives up to the name; straight up berries. Fruit and flowery highlights. This smells like dessert at a fine restaurant. The smell also retrieve...â€
â€œThis is the best strain for anxiety I've eve smoked,  and it really does taste like Rasberry.â€
â€œThis is the best strain for anxiety I've eve smoked,  and it really does taste like Rasberry.â€

â€œThis stuff is amazing for a Kush, it's a hybrid indica dominant strain. There is some Sativa in the hybrid. And you can feel it a strong head high that creeps into a strong body stone. Yet you are able to still function, a bit of couch lock in the picture though. Not that you cannot manage do things . Gaming is excellent, Music is orgasmic, And all your pain is gone. This is a 10/10 in my book, my new favorite strain...â€

â€œFirst time I had this strain was with my second mom in the backyard. She told me she got it in a mystery pack from her dealer. It was visibly purple, it smelled sweet, and it tasted absolutely amazing. It made me relax and feel at ease. The second time I had it was two hours later when her son and his friend brought 5g of RK and oh my gosh it was heaven. I am very happy with this strain. By far my favorite indica.â€

â€œThis is the best strain i've ever smoked for Anxiety, i feel uplifted and focussed, this isnt a stoney but more of a high,  it doesnt feel like an indica normally does, and theres a heavy body high also, this strain feels CBD rich.â€

â€œThis is the best weed I have smoked in awhile and I've been smoking Nice Guy and Cherry Pie etc. if earthy flavored weed disgusts you this is the one because its yummy!!!! It even got me laughing and feeling like i was in that new side of perception. Great for arousal, happiness, giggly ness, euphoria, and hunger.â€

â€œRaspberry Kush is a huge hit with all of my patients. The deep hues purple leaves are a sight for sore eyes. The buds are coated with a dusty glitter, much like that of frozen morning dew. The orange hairs set the plant ablaze like orange lightning bolts against a stormy purple sky. My patients report decreased nausea, insomnia and anxiety as well as temporary relief from arthritis, joint pain and muscle aches. 4.9 r...â€
â€œTOKâ€

â€œTwo things.
One. It is one of those strains that you still enjoy in a joint as much as vaping it. Good taste.
Two. Best cannabis strain for sex, makes you horny and doesn't stop your from being active.

No couch lock, just relaxing, relatively clear headed high.â€
â€œOne of my favorite night time strains. It has a sweet taste and a smooth hit. I feel the effects immediately, and it increases as the high creeps in.â€

â€œSoothing.  Felt shoulder and neck pain slowly melt away.  Relaxation without the couch lock or heavy eyelids.  Nice afternoon medication for when you still have to get stuff around the house done.â€

â€œThis stuff is really good for muscle pain and anxiety! No couch lock but really relaxed. It's nice if you're around friends, because you can focus pretty well and it makes you social. Hit really fast and lasted  2/3 hours! It's super tasty too- lots of raspberry and a minty aftertaste.â€

â€œFirst time I've tried it, and it seriously rivals my all time favorite, Jillybean. As a low THC tolerance and petite female, I'm always worried I'll overdo it so I take it slow at first! Baby puffs & a mini bubbler. But man... this Legit RBK had me already wanting more! The taste was lingering and sweet, fresh, floral. Can't wait to try it in the form of a concentrate! ğŸ“ğŸ’ğŸ”¥â™¥ï¸â€

â€œI used a Mighty and a bong with extra filtration. The flavor came through so beautifully. The effects are extremely relaxing.  All of your stress will just melt away. I have a panic disorder as well as Ehlers-Danlos and the pain just melts away.  I am using this as a daily medicinal so what ever you do, do not drive impaired on this strain while on blood thinners or without, your vision will get a bit blurry so bewar...â€

â€œit was a pretty bud with a really great smell to it. i felt extremely productive after smoking a bowl and got a lot done without even realizing it. lol i would recommend this bud for any daytime functional smokers for sure.â€
â€œLove this strain, the aroma and flavor are outstanding! Wonderful light feeling, great for spending the chilling ğŸ˜â€

â€œAbsolutely love this strain. It helps me a ton when I am experiencing gastrointestinal cramping from my condition. I highly recommend this strain, especially if you are prone to anything that involves physical discomfort or pain. I smoked a single bowl and felt not only the immense physical relief from the flower, but a surprisingly strong feeling of euphoria. It is a relaxing bud that doesn't leave you blurry-eyed o...â€

â€œI really enjoyed this bud it was great tasting on the exhale and was long lasting, it was the best high i have experienced so far, it made me wanna get up and dance to the music i was listening to, and i wouldn't recommend to a first time smoker though cause a few times i smoked it i was a little over paranoid. and some people might not kno how to deal with that.  the only negatives i experienced otherwise are dry mo...â€

â€œThis is a strain I was given when I asked for an upbeat indica I could dab. Raspberry Kush is a great daytime indica. â€œNice taste, very smooth high.â€
â€œVery relaxing strain, but I felt much more energetic with it than most indicas. Watched some funny TV and couldn't wipe the smile off my face. Very good body high.â€
â€œThis is one of my favorite strains. I got it at a club in the bay area when I was on my way back home and it was honestly one of the best buds I've ever tasted!â€

â€œMy first indica strain. I generally prefer sativa strains however I was more in the mood for something heavier when I got this. This did the trick wonderfully. Mild to moderate head high with a good body high to go along with it. Pick yourself up some of this, find a location at home to be comfy at and just relax. Or better yet, do what I did and find someone to play with, you'll want to do that too.â€

â€œGreat Indica,really nice Berry Fruity Flavor and Smell. Im most definitely feeling a body high,very relaxed,calm,and collective. Perfect night time strain and sleep inducing meaning its great if your in need of instant sleep.â€

â€œGreat body relaxer really mellows your physical being. I anticipated this strain to make me a bit sleepy but found it surprisingly alert for as mellow as my body feels. A nice movie or some snuggling could be in order.â€

â€œIndica with a head buzz accompanied with anxiety. I prefer indicas to be much more relaxing than this strain. Raspberry Kush is not for me. Indicas that offer much more relaxation and euphoria without anxiety include Mendo's Breath, Afgoo, and Grandaddy Purple.â€
â€œSome of the tastiest buds in town !!!â€

â€œI got this from a local dispensary called Rainbow. This is the best strain I have had in a while. It took away almost all my pain, and helped significantly with my anxiety and depression. â€œExcellent strain if you're looking to chill with friends. The cotton mouth is hell but well worth it. Pretty good body high that works well for pain relief if you don't have any plans.
